colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @053A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO SPYAN RAS GZIGS RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO'I DKYIL 'KHOR TU 'JUG CING DBANG BLANG BA'I CHO GA DNGOS GRUB 'DOD 'JO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GZHAN DU MA LA PHAN PA'I BSAM PAS NYE BAR BSKUL TE, RGYAL DBANG PHYUG NA SMOD BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS DANG 'BREL BA ZHAG BYUNG NA CHO GA DE NYID KYI ZHABS 'DEGS SU'ANG 'GYUR BAR MTHONG NAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' DRIN LAS LHA MCHOG 'DI NYID KYI DBANG DANG SMIN GROL GYI GDAMS PA LUGS SROL SO SO BA MANG DU THOB PA'I BAN ^ DAM TSIG RDO RJES BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN GSOL DPON 'DZIN BZANG POS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG ZAB CING GSANG @053B BA'I LAM BZANG 'DI NYID PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
